traits.Martial Advantage: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
